mapper.select: select count(*) from tblClass where hostSeq = (select hostSeq from tblHost where id=#{id})

select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq} and co.classdate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select nvl(sum(co.price),0) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq} and co.classdate between #{startDate} and #{today}
select nvl(sum(co.price),0) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq}
select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq}

select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq inner join tblClassReview cr on sc.signupseq = cr.signupseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq}

select nvl(sum(cr.score)/#{reviewCount},0) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq inner join tblClassReview cr on sc.signupseq = cr.signupseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq}
select hostSeq from tblHost where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tblClass (classSeq, hostseq, title, content, categorybig, categorysmall, location, latitude, longitude) values (seqClass.nextVal,#{hostSeq},#{title},#{content},#{categoryBig},#{categorySmall},#{location},#{latitude},#{longitude})
insert into tblClassImage (classImageSeq, classImage, classSeq) values (seqClassImage.nextVal, #{classImage}, #{classSeq})
mapper.select: select * from vwMyClassList where hostSeq = (select hostSeq from tblHost where id = #{id})
select n.*,rownum from (select * from tblNotice n order by regdate desc) n where rownum between 1 and 3

select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq inner join tblUser u on u.userseq = sc.userseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq} and u.gender='남자'

select sum(co.price) as sales,to_char(co.classdate,'yyyy-mm') as classDate from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classseq = co.classseq inner join tblsignupclass sc on co.classoptionseq = sc.classoptionseq where c.hostseq=#{hostSeq} and to_char(co.classdate,'yyyy-mm') like '2021%' group by to_char(co.classdate,'yyyy-mm')
